name: T - Marica

expression;Emma;Smile
speak;Emma; Hey, Marica!{w} I see you're keeping your lance as sharp as ever.
speak;Marica; I always gotta keep it sharp, Emma.{w}{c:expression;Marica;Smile} You never know if we're going to get attacked{tgm}...{tgm}{w} or if a little girl is going to keep annoying me.
expression;Emma;NoSmile
bop_portrait;Emma
speak;Emma; Wh- I'm not a little girl!{w} Our ages aren't even that far apart!
expression;Marica;NoSmile
speak;Marica; It's about how you act, not the number.{w} Carry yourself like an adult and you'll be treated like one.
speak;Emma; Hey, I always carry my tome with me no matter where I go!{w} Just try not to sharpen your lance so much it gets small and worthless.
bop_portrait;Marica
speak;Marica; Wh- My lance isn't small!{w} You take that back, Emma!
speak;Emma; I don't see why I should, but{tgm}...{tgm} Fine, fine, I didn't mean it.
speak;Emma; Man, she's sensitive about that lance of hers.{w} It's actually kind of funny.;;;thought_bubble;no_talk
speak;Marica; Hmph, we'll leave it at that, then.{w} Sonia always told me there's no point holding a grudge against colleagues.
speak;Emma; How did you get into the village guard, anyway?

speak;Marica; I used to be a traveler. One day, while passing near Meadhaven,{w} Sonia found me training outside the village walls.{w} She said she saw the potential in me,{w} offered me a place to train with her and work with the guards.{w} Accepting her offer was one of the best decisions of my life.
speak;Emma; I remember being excited to meet you when Sonia said she found another apprentice.{w} You always do bring a certain amount of energy to a hunt or patrol shift.

speak;Marica; Oh, well, you're welcome.{w} If we're speaking candidly, I'm just happy to be here.{w} I{tgm}...{tgm}liked the village, and I want to keep everyone here safe.{w} Just remember not to get in my way when I'm trying to protect you.
speak;Emma; Oh, uh, I'll make sure to be more help than burden, then!
